title: Top countries by pharmaceutical industry employment 2014
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of employees in the y axis.
The Number of employees is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Turkey.
The maximum Country China has got 65.57 times higher Number of employees than the minimum Country Turkey.
min_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of employees in each Country on the y axis.
The Number of employees is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Turkey.
